body:
Hey guys,
I know in the update that we are bringing back survival games, which consequently means Elimination is going out the door.  So that leads up to this question: what happens to the xp we earned in elimination? Is it removed? 
Thanks, 
Random_Guy

title: Question about SG and Elimination

replies.body:
Survival Games and Elimination are two completely different things.
Survival Games: 24 or 48 players fight where they can only get their items from chests and can only break leaves.
Elimination: Pretty much Hunger Games, where multiple people have a grace period, during the grace period you can break any block to get you resources, after time is up players fight, last one standing wins.
